coreAttributes.authorTag: A small disclaimer on the label claims 'Buck's is a subsidiary of MintyChip Foods'
coreAttributes.name: Buck's Root Beer
coreAttributes.description: A can with a brown label proudly declaring it to be Buck's brand root beer. Among the listed ingredients are vanilla, sarsaparilla roots, and a large amount of surgar.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first opening it with a hiss, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the can of Buck's Root Beer up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A very sweet smell of vanilla rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the cool liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(discover)] that it tastes exactly the same as its smell.
